name: The Invitation (CosmiicFox)
description:
The Invitation

The Invitation is a game is inspired in a Korean ritual called the Elevator Game. 

The ritual performed is based on pressing floor keys on an elevator in a certain order to be allowed into another dimension. This ritual includes different floor sequence and different things happen. 

There is a clue in every floor that leads the player to know the next floor to be pressed.

If the player does not follow the right sequence, the player will face fatal consequences and the game is over. 

Controls:

  • AWSD: Walk
  • Mouse Movement: Look around
  • Keypad numbers: Press the floor number

Since this was an university project, as a Floor Selector, we have configured a phone and used an Arduino to connect it with the game. 

For any player, you can simply use your Keyboards' Numpad.

For more information about the Gameplay, Mechanics & Story, check the documentation bellow.

We hope you enjoy playing The Invitation!
